title: Christie Showcases Breadth of Control Room Solutions at ASIS 2015
text: Christie Showcases Breadth of Control Room Solutions at ASIS 2015 Highlights include launch of Phoenix Quad-T for enhanced control room monitoring and 98-inch UHD flat panel. ANAHEIM, CA, September 24,   Christie is showcasing its latest control room solutions at ASIS 2015 in Anaheim, California from September 28-30. Displaying the newest and most innovative technology for security professionals, Christie will demonstrate the new Christie Phoenix Quad-T processor, Christie Entero HB 70-inch HD front access cube and LCD solutions including the Christie FHD552-X 55-inch, ultra-narrow bezel flat panel and the new FHQ981-L 98-inch UHD flat panel. "For security professionals looking for end-to-end control room solutions, Christie's experience designing and implementing solutions for security, surveillance and emergency operation centers is unparalleled," says Dave Muscat, senior director, Americas, technical sales and solutions, Christie. "Christie provides the right solution for any budget, all backed by the best customer service and support in the industry. ASIS 2015 attendees will see industry leading technology for the mission-critical operating environment." Christie Phoenix Quad-T: The next generation of content management Launching at ASIS 2015, the Christie Phoenix Quad-T is a 4K/UHD streaming encoder used with Phoenix videowall processing systems. The Phoenix Quad-T can be installed anywhere on a network to seamlessly expand a Phoenix system by adding additional inputs in a cost effective manner. Featuring four HDMI connectors, each supporting 4K/UHD resolutions up to 3840 x 2160 pixels and four mini-USB ports for soft KVM control, the Phoenix Quad-T allows users to acquire high-quality, remote video and control signals over IP networks, enabling teams to work with the same data, regardless of location. The Phoenix and Phoenix Quad-T will be powering all displays within the Christie booth. Display solutions for control room environments Showing at ASIS 2015 is Christie's award-winning 98-inch UHD flat panel. The Christie FHQ981-L panel offers unparalleled performance, ease of installation and affordability for control room environments and is fully compatible with Christie Phoenix. Also on display will be the Christie FHD552-X 55-inch LCD panel, ideal for tiled display walls in control room environments. The ultra-narrow bezel and high-pixel density offer industry-leading image quality with a low cost of ownership, and can be installed in either portrait or landscape orientation. ASIS attendees will see a 2 x 2 display of 70-inch Christie Entero HB front access display cubes. Ideal for rooms with limited space, Christie Entero HB display solutions offer exceptional ease of installation in a variety of cube sizes and is the only LED control room display to offer control through Wi-Fi connectivity. Captiva Series: Bright light for small spaces Also on display will be the super-quiet Christie Captiva Series, which provides 20,000 hours of high performance lamp-free operation with the ability to achieve full brightness within seconds and move instantaneously into standby mode with no cool down period. The high definition Christie Captiva DHD400S offers native 16:9 aspect ratio matching up perfectly with the most common signals used today. The ultra-short throw Christie Captiva DUW350S brings a new captivating and creative wide canvas for tight spaces and, simultaneously, offers a unique, but practical workspace for everyday activities. # # #
